'''Miniel''' (pl. ''Mínil'') ([[Sindarin|S]]. 'First elf') is the name [[Vanyar]] were called in [[Beleriand]].
==Etymology==
The word is composed of ''[[min]]'' = "first" and ''[[Edhel|el]]'' = "elf"
==References==
* {{WJ|Quendi}}, pgs. 363-364; 383.
